articles.title: Shocking findings! Mars spinning faster than ever, says NASA - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA’s InSight lander discovers Mars's rotating speed is getting faster each year which is decreasing the Martian day.
articles.content: NASA's InSight Mars lander revealed some shocking data about the Red Planet's rotation speed and the findings suggest that its days are getting shorter. The lander reached Mars in 2018 to study the 4… [+1931 chars]
